# ghibli 

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/ewenme/ghibli.png)](https://travis-ci.org/ewenme/ghibli) 

![](ghibli.jpg)

Sprinkle some Studio Ghibli over your R plots and palettes.

## Installation

Get the development version from GitHub now. 

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# If you haven't installed devtools yet, do so
install.packages("devtools")

# install package from github
devtools::install_github("ewenme/ghibli")
```

## Palettes

```{r}
# load package
library(ghibli)

# see palette names
names(ghibli_palettes)
```

## Usage

```{r, ggplot, fig.height = 3}
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  scale_color_manual(values = ghibli_palette("MononokeMedium")) +
  theme_gray()
```

```{r, ggplot2, fig.height = 3}
qplot(factor(cyl), data=mtcars, geom="bar", fill=factor(vs)) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = ghibli_palette("PonyoMedium"))
```
